abstract.t: This document describes checkpoints of [I-D.yasskin-http-origin-signed-responses] to synchronize implementation between clients, intermediates, and publishers. Note to Readers Discussion of this draft takes place on the HTTP working group mailing list (ietf-http-wg@w3.org), which is archived at https://lists.w3.org/Archives/Public/ietf-http-wg/ [1]. The source code and issues list for this draft can be found in https://github.com/WICG/webpackage [2].
